---
title: "RIBBiTR Database Access Center"
---

This is a repository for organizing and hosting data access resources within the [RIBBiTR](https://ribbitr.com/) project. As an interdisciplinary and cross-scale research project, RIBBiTR's goals require open collaboration and communication within the team.

Take a look at the resources provided in the menu for this page.

Facilitating the effective communication of data within the team is part of this effort, though is no replacement for interpersonal communication. Confused by the data? See something odd? Don't hesitate reach out to the [RIBBiTR data manager](mailto:cobstainesconsulting@gmail.com), to talk it through, to help us to improve our communiation and collaboration within the team.
